resources.string: Asanas, or yoga postures, are specific physical poses designed to cultivate physical and mental well-being. Practiced alongside controlled breathing techniques, each asana targets different muscle groups, enhances flexibility, and promotes overall strength and balance. Rooted in Sanskrit terminology, these postures carry ancient wisdom that connects practitioners to yoga\'s philosophical and spiritual foundations. Beyond physical benefits like improved joint mobility and circulation, asanas also foster mental clarity, stress reduction, and a deeper sense of self-awareness..
